DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study it to compare the effects of Holy-Comod and Tears Naturale Forte on ocular surface and tear inflammatory mediators in patients after Phaco+IOL.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Holy-Comod and Tears Naturale Forte in Patients After Phaco+IOL
DOC.criteria: 6072 years old classification of lens nucleus is LOCS â…¡ patients with previous history of ocular surgery, corneal diseases,uveitis ,ocular hypertension or glaucoma ,systemic diseases.
